channel.title: [508] making item cost tickets~
channel.description:
I am currently making castle wars perfect in my 508 i'm about 85% done. For castle wars I have it to when you win you get castle wars tickets. 3 win 2 tie 1 lose. now in the shop that I have there I need to know how when you want to buy something you have to have so many tickets. [b]Example:[/b]Fighter torso cost 25 tickets.
Please help, if there is a tut please give link =] Although i've looked I haven't found one yet.

item.title: [508] making item cost tickets~

@rain1994 wrote:

Davidi2:

Like I said, I don’t use berky, I don’t know what he changed with shops. So I can’t tell you what file to look in.

U used bulby correct? what did bulby use?

item.title: [508] making item cost tickets~
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

Davidi2:

I don’t know what berky uses for shopping, but you just need to change like playitems.hasItem() from 995 to whatever cwars tickets are

Thanks David. what Java file? if its differant for 508’s tell me were you would have put it.
